msg.msgText:
The values of configuration items of "ClusterMembership" composite object can be obtained using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver show ClusterMembership help imaserver show ClusterMembership
EXAMPLE: imaserver show ClusterMembership
The following configuration items are returned:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command help.
